ExportedFolder.Name: 绝亚P4豪华全套轮椅 by 尼尼科技

Trigger.Name: 确定判决buff解析
Trigger.RegularExpression: ] 1A:1[0-9A-F]{7}:(?<player>.*?) gains the effect of (Final Word: |確定判決：)(?<buff>Escape Detection|Contact Regulation|Escape Prohibition|Contact Prohibition|接触保護|逃亡監察|接触禁止|逃亡禁止)

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: 双分摊，${var:分摊位置}${var:分摊位置}${var:分摊位置}
